name: Cool Name Here
description:
Cool Name Here

Game initially developed for study purposes, but I developed affection for it and is now in the development phase. :D

How to play

W,S,A,D - Move

Mouse - Aim

MouseLeft - Shoot

Alpha1, Alpha2 - Switch Weapon

P - Pause

Updates

Corrections

- Adjustments to collisions in stops and cars;

- UI SFX and Enemies;

- Bug of not saving the player's name;

New Features

- Leaderboard with player ranking;

- BlinkHurt as an indicator of damage;

- Health potion every 5 Waves;

- Small speed adjustment on the player;

Final considerations

Thanks for playing, please leave your feedback below so I can improve!
